Posts.Content: GB1985 wrote: Hi everyone, A week ago I was diagnosed with Benign Spindle cell Tumor. I've tried to browse this section but didn't find any info about it. Anybody here familiar with this Dx? I'm scheduled for excision on March 8 and they need to place a "seed" a day or two before the surgery. I would like to ask of anybody here had an experience with seed? I read it's radioactive. Is it safe for me to be around my 2 y/o? Thank you. Best, Grace Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Dx with Benign Spindle Cell Tumor GB1985 GB1985
